title: AI and Copyright
body: Interesting cases involving AI and copyright currently that could change the trajectory of AI in the art market. Lawsuits about over how it learned and legal battles about who gets royalties!

title: Should AI be open source?
body: Curious about yall's opinions, should AI be open source to democratize tech or is the risk of what AI can do too great?

title: Will AI really replace jobs?
body: Hey everyone, what are your thoughts on AI replacing the workforce, do you really believe it or is it going to help increase productivity in the workforce?
